original: Jönsson, Thure Harald, direktör, Göteborg, f. 22/5/07 i Gbg arv telegr:-koimm. Manne J. o. Anna Björnberg. G. 3S m. Carin Berlin. — Stud :ex. v. Borås’ h. a. 1. 26, ut ex. fr. Gbgs ha;nd’:inst; ’fackkurs I 27. Res. t. Danmark o. Norge 35, Tyskl. o. Schweiz 39. Anst. i ’skeppsmäkl:firman Borlind, Bersén & Co. 28-35, kontichef i Rederi A-B Gbg-Frederikshavn-Linjen 36, dir. sed. 47. Led. avstyr, f. Gbgso. Boh. 1. turisttrafikfören. sed. 45, klubbmäst. i Round Table nr 2 sed. 46, led. av styr. f. Gbgs bågskyttekl. 46 o. Gbgs skålkl. ised. 37. Hobbies: segling, målning. EmmeryM 43.
translated: Jönsson, Thure Harald, director, Gothenburg, born May 22nd, 1907 in Gothenburg. Son of Manne J. and Anna Björnberg. Married to Carin Berlin in 1935. Passed final exams at Borås' High School in 1926 and received a degree from Gothenburg's School of Commerce. Completed a specialized course in 1927. Traveled to Denmark and Norway in 1935 and Germany and Switzerland in 1939. Employed at the shipping brokerage firm Borlind, Bersén & Co. from 1928-1935, served as the head of accounts at Rederi A-B Gbg-Frederikshavn-Linjen in 1936, and has been a director since 1947. Member of the board for the tourist traffic association for Gothenburg and Bohuslän since 1945, clubmaster at Round Table no. 2 since 1946, and member of the board for Gothenburg's archery club since 1946 and Gothenburg's sculling club since 1937. Hobbies include sailing and painting. Married EmmeryM in 1943.

education.name: Degree from Gothenburg's School of Commerce
